named-query.name: BC_READ_ALL_SUBCATEGORIES
named-query.query: SELECT category FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.Category category WHERE category.parentCategory = :parentCategory

named-query.name: BC_READ_CATEGORY_BY_URL_KEY
named-query.query: SELECT category FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.Category category WHERE category.urlKey = :urlKey

named-query.name: BC_READ_CATEGORIES_BY_PARENT_CATEGORY_AND_AVTIVE_DATES
named-query.query: SELECT category FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.Category category WHERE category.parentCategory = :category AND category.activeStartDate <= CURRENT_DATE AND (category.activeEndDate > CURRENT_DATE OR category.activeEndDate = null) ORDER BY category.displayOrder
